CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 10, 1956, pg. 1, reads: "Civic Center Site - Three small boys, whose families will be displaced soon, watch the start of the demolition work to erase the old Hill District is order to establish a new civic center. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Three boys watching demolition of buildings by R. J. Omslaer Wrecking Company crane, at future site of Civic Arena, Lower Hill District
